entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:10 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:10 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
